sentences.sContent: We decided not to go any farther.
sentences.sCn: 我们决定不再往前走了。

sentences.sContent: Most of them were locals, but some had come from farther afield (= a greater distance away ) .
sentences.sCn: 他们大部分是当地人，但也有一些来自较远的地方。

sentences.sContent: A table stood at the farther end of the kitchen.
sentences.sCn: 厨房的那一头放着一张桌子。

sentences.sContent: ...But that’s farther than where we want to go...
...not only because he/she is farther behind...
...Daddy never had very close relationships with his children and drifted even farther away from us after the divorce...

synos.tran: 更远地；此外；更进一步地
进一步的；更远的（far的比较级）

trans.tranOther: a greater distance than before or than something else; a  comparative  form of ‘far’
more distant; a  comparative  form of ‘far’
